reviewText: costly. but only option if you love this series.
The box set is the best value for all three movies. The first 2 movies are highly recommended. It is good to have these in Blue Ray.

A trio of classic Chinese films from the 80s. These prints are very clear. It does not have the burned in subtitles. The subtitles are done correctly and well translated. The film quality is very clear.

If you have never seen these films, you need to get them. They are amazing. Joey Wang is a very underrated actress. Some of the best supernatural Chinese wire-fu films ever made.

HongKong has produced some of the finest action fantasy films in the history of cinema! Come on criterion, if you care about the history of cinema like you claim you do you would release at least a hand full of these movies. They certainly release a lot of samurai films why can't they get titles that influenced hollywood blockbusters such as the Matrix & Kill Bill. Movies like Yen Woo Ping's DreadNaught, Tsui Hark's Zu-Warriors & Cheung Sai Tung's a Chinese GhostStory trilogy.
